Text.Page: <PCNAME>! I need your helpâ€”right now!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What's wrong?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

The argons attacked a Shariar transport somewhere between the Argon Bulwark and Carnage Vale.

Your orders are to locate the transport and provide aid to any survivors. Especially...uh, just hurry."I'll leave at once."
Didn't expect to see anyone so quickly. I assume I have Truhna to thank for that.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Any casualties?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

None from the crash, but the subsequent ground attack cost us a lot of lives.

We've set up a defensible position, and I have scouts moving toward our original target, but we could use some help if you're up to it.
